key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks due to dependence on approvals like FDA and CE Mark
Intense competition from established players like Intuitive Surgical and emerging startups
Adoption barriers due to high upfront costs and specialized surgeon training requirements
Supply chain vulnerabilities from reliance on third-party suppliers
Ethical and safety concerns related to surgical outcomes and potential adverse events
controversies: Potential adverse events or controversies related to surgical outcomes
Regulatory scrutiny and delays in approvals
social_issues: High upfront costs may limit access to advanced surgical treatments in cost-sensitive markets
governance_issues: Compliance risks associated with regulatory approvals and ongoing scrutiny
